body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         Family exploring the boardwalk while working on Junior Ranger books. NPS/Lauren Gurniewicz  Visitors of all ages are invited to participate in Congaree National Park's Junior Ranger program. Stop by the Harry Hampton Visitor Center to pick up your Junior Ranger program book. Complete the activities and earn an official Congaree National Park Junior Ranger patch and badge!
